About Me

  • Name: Micah Dunson
  • Company: Co-Founder of Phoja Unlimited LLC
  • Title: Musician / Programmer
  • Age: 36yrs
  • Location: Oxnard, Ca
  • Hobbies: Coding, Hiking, Gaming, Cooking

Creativity is the beginning

For years I've created, written, and performed music for people all over the world. I started in my early teens discovering my creative side, first with music, then with paint and soon after, other outlets as well. Fastforward 3 years ago, this is when I started working on computer programming after watching a friend make a website from scratch. Seeing what could be done it almost seemed like magic, but nope, it was just javascript.

Since that time I have completed a number of online courses from reputable websites like Team TreeHouse, Codecadmey, and FreeCoderCamp ranging from WordPress basics to Full Stack Javascript development in order to hone my skills. Most recently I worked with a team on a project at Coder Camps, a bootcamp style school for teaching how to develop using the MEAN stack, to develop a social media style web application for new developers called Coder-Net.

Experience & Skills

I've worked on many projects and some of the technologies that I have worked with are the following:

Top

Projects

Coder Net

The Problem: Most new programmers lack the skills or experience to get a job right out of school.

The Solution: I Worked on a team for Coder Camp to design a social media style application that would help the user be able to get both more skills and possibly experience thru partnered projects, forums, community networking, and resources for jobs and programming. This project was built utilizing the MEAN stack (Angular, Express, Node, and Mongo DB), and designed with Angular Material. I was in charge of implementing file uploads, email verification, backend debugging, layout, styling and functionality of forums and user profile states.


Coder-Net

Movie Zone

The Problem: For people who have large collections of movies, remebering what movie you own can be difficult at times.

The Solution: I designed this for a client who needed a way to organize their personal movie collection. The application is very simple, the user simply adds a the movie information and is able to view their personal collection similiar to the IMDB database. This project was built using Javascript, Bootstrap, AJAX, and Firebase for the database.

Movie Zone

Mic Doja Music

The Problem: People are always looking for good music but a lot of musicians don't offer the variety that people want.

The Solution: I started music production in 1993. Since that time period I have produced a variety of music on a variety of topics. I've partnered up with promotional company Groove International and have since sold over thousands of copies of my music all over the world.

Follow Mic Doja Music on social media!
